actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to provide minimum fuel economy standards for every passenger automobile manufactured in the United States.

summary.text: Mandatory Automotive Fuel Economy Act - Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to establish mandatory minimum motor vehicle fuel economy standards for passenger automobiles of 19 miles per gallon for model year 1982, 21 miles per gallon for model year 1983, 23 miles per gallon for model year 1984, and 25 miles per gallon for model year 1985. Empowers the limited States district courts to prohibit introduction of passenger automobiles in interstate commerce which do not meet such minimum fuel economy standards.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to provide minimum fuel economy standards for every passenger automobile manufactured in the United States.
